description: Rich Kelly"The Wrecking-Ball"Ht: 5'11"Wt: 165lbsSeason W/L Record (0-1)Jacob Durham"The Bull"Ht: 5'9"Wt: 175lbsSeason W/L Record (0-0) Newcomer Jacob "The Bull" Durham is a hot southern stud with a nice fat cock. His opponent is returning fighter Rich "The Wrecking-Ball" Kelly. After an unfortunate loss to Mitch "The Machine" Vaughn, Wrecking-Ball is back for redemption, making sure to focus on his cardio training to prepare for the match. The Bull just thinks his opponent needs a shave after a good ass kicking on the mat, while Wrecking-Ball says The Bull needs to spend less time on the beach and more time at the gym. The shit talking riles these two up as they hit it hard to the mat once the whistle blows. Will Wrecking-Ball redeem himself and show The Bull who's boss, or will the newcomer keep his promise and give Wrecking-Ball a nice ass whooping before fucking him into submission? Let's get it on!
title: Rich "The Wrecking-Ball" Kelly vs Jacob "The Bull" Durham
